items: Are docstrings written in valid ReStructuredText (or Google/NumPy style)?
Do all public modules, classes, and functions have docstrings?
Does the docstring describe arguments, return values, and exceptions?
Are type information included in docstrings if not using type hints?
Is 'doctest' used to verify code examples in docstrings?
Are docstrings kept up-to-date with code changes?
